meanings.sent1: The old books moldered away in the damp cellar.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the fallen leaves moldered into rich soil.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich moldered in the lunchbox, much to the dismay of its owner.
meanings.sent4: Neglected dreams moldered in the corners of his mind, fading into obscurity.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house moldered into a ghostly shell of its former self.

meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins moldered slowly under the weight of time.
meanings.sent2: The neglected statue moldered into a pile of dust.
meanings.sent3: The cake moldered on the kitchen counter, forgotten by the busy baker.
meanings.sent4: His resolve moldered like old paper in the rain, leaving him feeling defeated.
meanings.sent5: The once proud castle moldered into a heap of stones, lost to history.

meanings.sent1: The fruit moldered quickly in the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned ship moldered away in the salty sea.
meanings.sent3: The neglected garden moldered into a tangle of weeds and thorns.
meanings.sent4: Her trust in him moldered slowly, eroded by his constant lies.
meanings.sent5: The fallen tree moldered into the forest floor, returning to the earth.
